name: obision-system
description: System monitoring, status and info application

scripts.clean: rm -rf builddir && rm -rf mesonbuilddir && rm -rf debian/obision-system debian/.debhelper debian/files debian/debhelper-build-stamp
scripts.meson-install: npm run build && npm run meson-setup && npm run meson-compile && cd mesonbuilddir && sudo meson install
scripts.meson-uninstall: cd mesonbuilddir && sudo ninja uninstall && cd .. && npm run meson-clean
scripts.deb-build: dpkg-buildpackage -us -uc -b && mkdir -p builddir && mv ../obision-system_*.deb builddir/obision-system.deb && mv ../obision-system_*.buildinfo builddir/ 2>/dev/null || true && mv ../obision-system_*.changes builddir/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.deb-install: sudo dpkg -i builddir/obision-system.deb && sudo apt-get install -f

author: Jose Francisco Gonzalez
